name: Kill The Dragon
description:
A one of a kind hilarious horrific choose your own adventure game!


Kill The Dragon is a choose your own adventure game. You go in search for the dragon to kill but watch out because there are gruesome deaths ahead!

A game to brighten your day during these dark times.

Features:

    - Created by Wallace Lovecraft!
    - Music by wonderful people!
    - Original handcrafted hand drawn art.
    - In 1920x1200 HD glory!
    - Multiple endings!
    - Almost every death has it’s own unique story and art!!!
    - This is a very short game that should take approximately 7 - 10+ minutes to beat but the memories gained will last a lifetime!
